audioText: Mon ami essaie d'apprendre à jouer de la guitare acoustique pour impressionner sa copine lors de leur anniversaire.
question: What is the friend trying to learn and why?
options: Acoustic guitar to impress his girlfriend on their anniversary.
Piano songs to surprise his girlfriend at her birthday.
Romantic poetry to recite on their first date.
Traditional dances to perform at their wedding.
explanation: The text states 'Mon ami essaie d'apprendre à jouer de la guitare acoustique pour impressionner sa copine lors de leur anniversaire' - My friend is trying to learn to play acoustic guitar to impress his girlfriend on their anniversary. 'Essaie' is the present form of 'essayer' (to try), third person singular.
